sentences.sentence: Takes all vertexes as initial population.
sentences.translation: 采用全部顶点做初始种群。

sentences.sentence: I then had to consider how to index the vertexes.
sentences.translation: 我当时不得不考虑如何索引的顶点。

sentences.sentence: The "mapping simplex method"is used instead of the "substitution of simplex vertexes".
sentences.translation: 用“映射单纯形”方法代替“单纯形顶点代换”方法；
